name: Why Did Chicken Cross Road?
description:
Remember to follow me! Thank you!

https://arcadegamestudio.itch.io/

How to play: Use arrow keys or tap controls to move. Spacebar to jump.

Have you got what it takes to lead a band of escaped farm chickens across a road and to freedom?

Collect feathers to increase your run speed and hop on logs to cross the river on your way to safety. 

Fun jaywalking game with a chicken theme which may answer the age old question of why did the chicken cross the road.

30 of the Funniest “Why Did the Chicken Cross the Road” Jokes

https://www.rd.com/article/why-did-the-chicken-cross-the-road-jokes/
